summary.span: 命名空间包含可用于创建自定义 SharePoint 命令的类型。

span.span: The namespace contains types you can use to create custom *SharePoint commands*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SharePoint 命令是可用于调用 Api 中 SharePoint 服务器对象模型扩展从 Visual Studio 中的 SharePoint 工具的方法。A SharePoint command is a method that can be used to call APIs in the SharePoint server object model from an extension for the SharePoint tools in Visual Studio. 有关详细信息，请参阅[调入 SharePoint 对象模型](/visualstudio/sharepoint/calling-into-the-sharepoint-object-models)并[如何： 创建 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command)。For more information, see [Calling into the SharePoint Object Models](/visualstudio/sharepoint/calling-into-the-sharepoint-object-models) and [How to: Create a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command).
